thread.title: Refinancing a Mortgage to Pay Off Credit-Card Debt - WSJ
thread.title_full: Refinancing a Mortgage to Pay Off Credit-Card Debt - WSJ

author: Alex Coppola
title: Refinancing a Mortgage to Pay Off Credit-Card Debt - WSJ
text:
A young professional living in New York felt she was being crushed by a mounting pile of credit-card debt. Despite earning $90,000 a year, she had no savings and had racked up $25,000 in debt on her cards, which cost her over $1,000 in monthly payments, says adviser Kristen Euretig.
“She was caught in this destructive cycle of paying down debt, not having enough cash, and putting new expenses on credit,” says Ms. Euretig, co-founder... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
